tags.name: api-headers-document
tags.description:
`api-headers-document`

A documentation for API headers.

It uses [AMF](https://github.com/mulesoft/amf) json/ld model to render
the view.

## Example

```html
<api-headers-document headers="[...]" opened></api-headers-document>

attributes.name: opened
attributes.description:
Set to true to open the view.
Automatically set when the view is toggle from the UI.

attributes.name: narrow
attributes.description: A property passed to the type document element to render a mobile friendly view.

attributes.name: headerLevel
attributes.description:
Type of the header in the documentation section.
Should be in range of 1 to 6.

attributes.name: graph
attributes.description: Passed to `api-type-document`. Enables internal links rendering for types.

properties.name: amf
properties.description:
Generated AMF json/ld model form the API spec.
The element assumes the object of the first array item to be a
type of `"http://raml.org/vocabularies/document#Document`
on AMF vocabulary.

It is only useful for the element to resolve references.

properties.name: opened
properties.description:
Set to true to open the view.
Automatically set when the view is toggle from the UI.

properties.name: narrow
properties.description: A property passed to the type document element to render a mobile friendly view.

properties.name: headerLevel
properties.description:
Type of the header in the documentation section.
Should be in range of 1 to 6.

properties.name: graph
properties.description: Passed to `api-type-document`. Enables internal links rendering for types.
